name: U.F.O (Lelandi)
description:
A short interactive story project done by a small group of animation students at SAE. The goal was to produce assets, learn how to implement animations and environmental assets into unreal engine to tell a story.

SYNOPSIS:
U.F.O is the heartfelt story of the relationship between an owner and their dog. The player explores the memories of the dog as he discovers more about the mystery of his past through flashbacks, leading to the player making an important decision for the dog's future at the end.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement
E - Interact / Continue
1 or ESC - Pause Game


Who are we?
